title: Karl Stefanovic takes a swipe at Kyle Sandilands after his obscene pay rise
text:
Karl Stefanovic has lashed out at Kyle Sandilands just one day after it was revealed the radio Titan had signed a new deal with KIIS FM that could earn him up to $8 million a year.

'In this new media landscape, I can't believe you're still on the radio,' Karl told Kyle at the Radio Alive conference in Brisbane on Friday, as reported by News.com.au.

'I think the whole world has gone absolutely crazy,' continued the 45-year-old former Today show host.

Taking a swipe: Karl Stefanovic (left) lashed out at Kyle Sandilands (right) at the Radio Alive conference in Brisbane on Friday

He then added: 'I got divorced and sacked, and you offend two of the world's great religions and get $8 million!'

But Kyle, 48, simply shrugged off Karl's remarks, claiming that while he used to get 'hurt' by criticism, he now simply doesn't care.

Last month, Kyle commented that the Virgin Mary was impregnated behind a camel shed, angering Christian and Muslim listeners, who demanded he be fired.

Jackpot: It was revealed Kyle had signed a new deal with his radio station KIIS FM, that could earn him and co-host Jackie 'O' Henderson up to $8 million each a year

Disbelief: After being fired from the Today show in December last year, Karl seemingly couldn't believe the radio shock jock was being rewarded for his bad behaviour

Kyle said of Jesus Christ's mother on air: 'I thought Mary was his girlfriend but apparently it was the mother.

'And the mother lied obviously and told everyone, "Nah, I got pregnant by a magical ghost." Bulls***.

'Someone chock-a-blocked her behind the camel shed... You might believe everything that's written down 2000 years ago to be absolutely accurate, and good on you, you're dumb. Dumb as dog s***.'

'I think the whole world has gone absolutely crazy,' Karl told Kyle. 'I got divorced and sacked, and you offend two of the world's great religions and get $8 million!'

Kyle's remarks led to protesters of multiple faiths gathering outside the KIIS Sydney studios calling for both Kyle and Jackie, 44, to be sacked.

He had also been forced to hire security to guard his Sydney home, and fled to Los Angeles until the hype subsided.

But a contrite Kyle insisted he had just been 'trying to make people laugh' and 'never meant to hurt anyone' with his 'joke' about Mary.
description: Karl Stefanovic has lashed out at Kyle Sandilands just one day after it was revealed the radio Titan had signed a new deal with  KIIS FM that could earn him up to $8 million a year.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
